item.title: New Mac Setup Script
item.description: I’ve been thinking about how to automate the process of making a new mac feel at home for me. So I’ve customized a script that does exactly that! This is shamelessly inspired by, and most of the stuff is a straight copy from bradp. Most likely you don’t want my exact setup, but feel free to take a look and rip off what you like! ðŸ™ƒ You can find my repo here.
